attributes.action: To use natural immunity and T cell memory for covid.
attributes.additional_details: Include natural immunity as you would people that have been jabbed. Otherwise you are creating a medical apartheid.
attributes.background: Natural immunity and T cell memory has been shown in studies from Israel, to show greater protection to new variants than those which have received the jab. This is a basic human right, body autonomy is a must and any such decision to overlook this is a blatant violation of basic freedoms.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about rules relating to people who have been fully vaccinated against Covid-19, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Allow people who’ve had covid-19 to travel under same restrictions as vaccinated: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599298
